Item.Value: [Text:Greetings, young one. I am $NPC_9$, a purveyor of magic and enchantments. My daughter and I heard about $Town$ and thought we should visit. A charming place, if lacking in amenities. Build us a house, and I'll see what can be done here.][UnlockBuildingID:49][Name:Introduction]

[Text:I hope you can help me. Some upstart goblins snuck into my house last night and stole my orb. It's very precious to me, and I want it back. If you get it for me, I'll make it worth your while.][Name:Quest0]

[Text:Ah! You've arrived. An artisan yes? I've never had the patience for that kind of thing. No, I prefer towield my magic more directly. It's a useful skill though, one I'm glad you're bringing to the town. Here. It's not much, just a few odds and ends I had laying around but it should get you started.][Name:Quest0End]
[Text:Hm. Do you need something from me? It seems that people only want to talk to me when they need something. Out with it.][Default][Name:Dialogue|1]
[Text:Hmm. You're in a rush today, aren't you? Slow down. The faster you run to your fate, the harder it is to escape the consequences.][Default][Name:Dialogue|2]
[Text:Huh, are you out and about today in this weather? In can't imagine why, it's intolerable. It's not fit for man, nor beast out there.][Weather:Raining][Name:Rain|1]

[Text:Hm, snowing outside is it? $NPC_15$ loves the snow, but I can't stand it. I'll leave trudging through the snow to you younger ones and stay inside, thank you very much.][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snow|1]

[Text:Keep your eyes peeled for the mushrooms that live in the forest. Their caps are useful for a lot of things, but they have an innate affinity for magic. Young $NPC_2$ got a nasty shock from one a few years back.][Name:Dialogue|3]

[Text:Hm. Well done, this house is adequate enough for our needs. Once I'm settled,I'll discuss with your Architect friend what can be done.][Once][RequiredBuildingID:13][SendMessage:1][Name:House Built]
